org.ardenus

Annotation Type Friend


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value={CONSTRUCTOR,METHOD})
public @interface Friend
    Enables the ability for a method to only be called by certain classes and methods without having an illegal access exception being thrown.

    TODO: This annotation is not yet functional, however it is recommended that this should still be used in places where considered necessary so that when the implementation is finished no extra work is necessary.
    Author:
    Trent "Whirvis" Summerlin

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      java.lang.String[] value 

    • Element Detail

      • value

        public abstract java.lang.String[] value
        Returns:
        the methods that are allowed to call the method. To list methods, their entire package, class, method, and parameters must be stated. An example of this would be org.ardenus.Friend.Validator.getClassMethod(java.lang.String). If you want to use a constructor as a friend, simply use a "^" before the parameters. An example of this would be java.lang.String^().
        Default:
        {}
